casebody.data:
CLAY et al., Appellants, v. HAYES et al., Respondents. (Supreme Court, General Term, Fourth Department. February 15, 1894.) Action by Harry G. Clay and others, trustees of the estate which was formerly of William Bingham, the elder, deceased, against George O. Hayes and another.

Argued before HARDIN, P..J., and MERWIN, J.

No opinion. Order affirmed, with $10 costs and disbursements.
